26791243_28,s7,T19,T9,One possible strategy to find the precise biochemical pathway responsible for the suppression of male sterility of ,CdsAms1, by overexpression of ,dPIS," would be to correlate the lipidomic observations with testis-specific gene expression or proteomic analysis of transcription factors, as well as lipid metabolic enzymes and their regulators.
